articles.author: Mark Schlabach
articles.title: Indiana's Fernando Mendoza, likely No. 1 pick, enters NFL draft - ESPN
articles.description: Indiana quarterback Fernando Mendoza, who won the Heisman Trophy and led the No. 1 Hoosiers to their first national championship this past season, is forgoing his final college season and entering the NFL draft, he announced on social media Friday.

articles.author: Patrick Smith
articles.title: 5 arrested in connection with shooting of Indiana judge and his wife - NBC News
articles.description: Police have arrested five people as part of a multi-state investigation into the shooting of an Indiana judge and his wife while they were at home on Sunday
articles.content:
Police have arrested five people as part of a multi-state investigation into the shooting of an Indiana judge and his wife while they were at home on Sunday.
